<a href="https://invest.misorobotics.com/morningbrew?utm_source=morningbrew&utm_medium=7_14&utm_campaign=dailybrew" style="border-bottom:none!important;" target="_blank" class=""><img alt="Miso" style="width:100%;max-width: 146px; display: inline; vertical-align: middle;" width="146" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL2NvbXBhbnkvbG9nby8zMTcvMTU5MzYxNTk4Ny1taXNvbG9nby5wbmciLCJidWNrZXQiOiJjb21ldC1tb3JuaW5nYnJldyIsImVkaXRzIjp7InJlc2l6ZSI6eyJ3aWR0aCI6MTAwMCwiaGVpZ2h0IjpudWxsfX19"></a>
</th>

<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-top:20px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Good morning. </strong>Today's Brew was written across three different time zones, which brings up a great question: What's the best time zone to live in? We crunched the numbers:</p>
<ol>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Central</span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Mountain</span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Eastern</span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Pacific </span></li>
</ol>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The reason being in the middle two you get a little flexibility without the extremes of waking up early or staying up late for important events.</p>
</td>
</tr>

</th>
</tr>
</table>

<div class="c6 " style="margin-bottom:7px">
<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
MARKETS
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/07/13/blank-check-mergers-becoming-lot-common?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Drawing a Blank
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="Blank check company" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8xNzEyL2JsYW5rX2NoZWNrX2NvbXBhbnkuanBnIiwiYnVja2V0Ijoib3Nsby1wcm9kdWN0aW9uIiwiZWRpdHMiOnsicmVzaXplIjp7IndpZHRoIjoxMDAwLCJoZWlnaHQiOm51bGx9fX0=">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Francis Scialabba</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Typically, the only way to get your hands on a blank check has been to direct a Marvel movie or have the last name Mahomes. Now, there might be another option. </p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0"><strong style="color:#000">2020: the year of the blank check</strong></h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">A blank check company, also known as a special purpose acquisition company (SPAC), is essentially a shell company listed on a public exchange that uses the funds it raises from selling shares to acquire a private company or startup.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Yesterday, billionaire hedge fund manager Bill Ackman’s SPAC targeting “mature unicorns” </span><span><a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-07-13/ackman-s-blank-check-company-increases-ipo-target-to-4-billion?sref=KkPzpZvz&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">increased the size</a></span><span> of its public offering set to take place later this week. </span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">Plus...</strong></span><span>electric vehicle maker Fisker </span><span><a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2020/07/13/ev-startup-fisker-to-go-public-through-merger-with-apollo-backed-firm-at-combined-value-of-2point9-billion.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">announced</a></span><span> it plans to go public through a merger with the blank check company Spartan Energy. </span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">Plus, plus...</strong></span><span>U.S. healthcare provider MultiPlan is </span><span><a href="https://www.ft.com/content/9a611108-caae-4a74-80b1-1235f4b8ba9b?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">set to merge</a></span><span> with a SPAC run by former Citigroup exec Michael Klein in an $11 billion deal that should be completed in October.</span>
</li>
</ul>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0"><strong style="color:#000">The blank check backstory</strong></h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">When going public via an IPO, a company has to deal with underwriters, investors, and a volatile market before it knows how much capital it will raise. In a blank check acquisition, <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/blank-check-boom-gets-boost-from-coronavirus-11594632601?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">negotiations are simpler</a>, involving only the company and the SPAC.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>That's why electric car maker Nikola decided on a blank check acquisition instead of an IPO, according to CFO Kim Brady. “We chose the SPAC route because there was simply too much uncertainty in the market with the coronavirus,” Brady told the WSJ. “If we had pursued the IPO path, we would not be a public company at this point.”</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Blank check acquisitions have been recently popular in the electric vehicle industry. Fisker's CEO Henrik Fisker explained the reasons behind the move to Emerging Tech Brew's Ryan Duffy yesterday. “The car industry is so capital-intensive. I’ve done this before. I really didn’t see the possibility of raising a billion dollars in private financing that easy,” Fisker said. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Bottom line:</strong> Bill Ackman is betting the market for SPACs is only getting bigger. His blank check offering is expected to be the largest ever.</p>

<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
COVID-19
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/07/13/california-imposes-new-statewide-business-restrictions?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Feels Like We Only Go Backwards
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Yesterday, California Gov. Gavin Newsom <a href="https://www.latimes.com/california/story/2020-07-13/newsom-california-county-rollback-reopening-coronavirus?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">announced</a> major new statewide restrictions to deal with <a href="https://www.latimes.com/projects/california-coronavirus-cases-tracking-outbreak/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">rising COVID-19 cases</a> and hospitalizations, including closing bars and indoor dining as well as museums, zoos, and other family entertainment.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>In 30 counties on the state’s watch list, gyms, churches, salons, and malls will be forced to close. Those counties account for more than 80% of California’s population.</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">For many businesses, this announcement comes about one month after they were allowed to welcome patrons back inside following the first wave of shutdowns. Restaurants can still operate takeout and outdoor dining, and bars can serve drinks outside.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Newsom tightened restrictions ahead of July Fourth as a precaution, but that didn’t stop the LA area from having its worst week on record last week. “It’s incumbent upon all of us to recognize soberly that COVID-19 is not going away any time soon until there is a vaccine or an effective therapy,” Newsom said. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Looking ahead...</strong>yesterday, the LA and San Diego public school districts said classes will start out <a href="https://www.npr.org/sections/coronavirus-live-updates/2020/07/13/890475212/los-angeles-and-san-diego-schools-announce-online-only-fall?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">online-only this August</a>.</p>

<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
TECH
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/07/13/apples-market-value-approaches-2t-analyst-upgrades?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
If We Say “Stock Jump,” Apple Says, “How High?”
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">It took Apple more than 40 years to hit a $1 trillion market cap, which it first did in August 2018. The march to $2 trillion has been a bit more brisk—although it dipped late in the day, Apple closed trading yesterday with a market value near $1.65 trillion after a pair of <a href="https://www.marketwatch.com/story/apple-stock-rallies-toward-another-record-high-amid-hope-for-iphone-trade-ins-china-demand-2020-07-13?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">analyst upgrades</a>.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Apple is not only within sniffing distance of $2 trillion...it’s dangerously close to Saudi Aramco, the oil and gas giant, for the title of world’s largest company by market value. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Aramco is worth a hair under $1.8 trillion, hampered by the recent downturn in energy prices.</span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>In March, the distance in market value between the two companies was $500 billion, </span><span><a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-07-13/apple-is-close-to-surpassing-saudi-aramco-in-market-value?sref=KkPzpZvz&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">writes Bloomberg</a></span><span>. But Apple’s stock has gained nearly 30% this year on overall bullishness people will want the newest iPhone, especially in China.</span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Bottom line: </strong>Despite a looming antitrust hearing in two weeks, Big Tech has thrived even as small businesses around the country implode. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">+ While we’re here...</strong>Apple will spend $400+ million on affordable housing in California this year as part of a <a href="https://www.engadget.com/apple-400-million-affordable-housing-california-141405086.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">$2.5 billion pledge</a> to address the state’s housing crisis. </p>

</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/07/13/siriusxm-buy-stitcher-325m?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Like Two Peas in a Pod
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>

<!--[if mso]>

<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Giphy</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;line-height: 1.38;"><span style="text-decoration: none;">Yesterday morning, SiriusXM confirmed it’s </span><a href="https://www.theverge.com/2020/7/13/21315911/siriusxm-stitcher-podcast-deal-buy-midroll-earwolf?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">buying</a><span style="text-decoration: none;"> podcasting company Stitcher for $325 million, the biggest podcast deal in history. </span></p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;line-height: 1.38;"><strong style="color:#000"><span style="text-decoration: none;">The who: </span></strong><span style="text-decoration: none;">Stitcher </span><a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/siriusxm-to-buy-stitcher-podcasting-unit-from-scripps-11594075192?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">operates</a><span style="text-decoration: none;"> a popular podcasting app, produces shows under its Earwolf and Stitcher brands, and sells advertising spots across 250+ shows. </span></p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;line-height: 1.38;"><span style="text-decoration: none;"><strong style="color:#000">The what: </strong></span><span style="text-decoration: none;">Sirius will also get the podcast ad company Stitcher bought a few years back, Midroll Media. But it needs to figure out how Midroll will sync up with AdsWizz, the podcast ad tech company it got in 2018 when it acquired Pandora (which </span><span style="text-decoration: none;">also</span><span style="text-decoration: none;"> streams podcasts).</span></p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;line-height: 1.38;"><strong style="color:#000"><span style="text-decoration: none;">The why: </span></strong><span style="text-decoration: none;">Sirius is trying to compete against Spotify, Apple, and iHeartMedia. Apple was first to the podcast space, but Spotify is muscling its way into becoming the Spotify of podcasts. </span></p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li dir="ltr" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px;list-style-type: disc; text-decoration: none;">
<span>
</span><span><p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;line-height: 1.38;"><span style="text-decoration: none;">Over the last few months, Spotify has ramped things up to 1.5x speed, recruiting big names like Joe Rogan, Kim Kardashian West, The Ringer, and DC Comics to its platform. And in June, it </span><a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/marketing/stories/2020/07/08/podcast-ad-tech-new-frontier?email={{profile.email}}&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">improved</a><span style="text-decoration: none;"> advertising offerings. </span></p></span><span>
</span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Big picture: </strong>Buying Stitcher adds one of the most prominent names in podcasting to Sirius’s portfolio and rounds out its in-house services for producers.</p>

<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
FOOD
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/07/13/chipotle-test-cauliflower-rice-two-states?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Does a Guilt-Free Burrito Exist?
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="Chipotle burrito " style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8xNzEzL2NoaXBvdGxlX2J1cnJpdG8ucG5nIiwiYnVja2V0Ijoib3Nsby1wcm9kdWN0aW9uIiwiZWRpdHMiOnsicmVzaXplIjp7IndpZHRoIjoxMDAwLCJoZWlnaHQiOm51bGx9fX0=">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Francis Scialabba</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">It does now. Chipotle is caving to popular demand and <a href="https://www.cnn.com/2020/07/13/business/chipotle-cauiflower-rice/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">testing</a> cilantro-lime “cauliflower rice” at 55 locations across Denver and Wisconsin. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Cauliflower rice is pretty much what it sounds like—cauliflower pulsed into rice-sized pieces. Low in calories and carbs and high in fiber and antioxidants, cauliflower has become a popular substitute for grains, mashed potatoes, pizza crust, and gnocchi when you get bored of eating things that have taste.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Fun fact: </strong>Arkansas, the U.S.’ biggest rice-producer, <a href="https://qz.com/1583670/cauliflower-rice-is-a-hot-political-issue-in-arkansas/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">banned companies</a> from marketing cauliflower rice as “rice” last year.</p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">Why mess with something that’s already perfect? </h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Consumers have been gravitating to healthier, plant-based, and low-carb options, especially since gaining the COVID-15. Chipotle’s tried getting ahead of trends; last year, it refreshed menus to be friendlier to keto, paleo, and Whole30 diets. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">But don’t expect too many changes. CEO Brian Niccol has said Chipotle won’t offer plant-based protein like Beyond Meat because they’re too processed. (Brian, if you’re reading, let us introduce you to <a href="https://cleangreensimple.com/recipe/jackfruit-carnitas/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">jackfruit carnitas</a>.)</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Zoom out: </strong>The biggest hurdle isn’t convincing customers to try cauliflower rice...it’s the $2 surcharge. In the tradeoff between splurging on guac or cauliflower, we all know who wins.</p>

</h3>

<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Thought experiment: </strong>You have one year to make $1 billion. Who do you choose as your partner—<a href="https://twitter.com/MorningBrew/status/1282399010846801920?s=20&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Kanye, Musk, Jenner, or Buffett</a>? </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Don’t lose focus: </strong>What if we told you there was a way to increase your focus and productivity in the span of just two weeks? There is a way: a game-changing workshop with author and entrepreneur Nir Eyal. <a href="https://www.nirandfar.com/becoming-indistractable/?partner=morningbrew&utm_source=morningbrew&utm_medium=partner&utm_campaign=mb_course_0706&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Learn more here</a>. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Have fun with coworkers: </strong>We created a <a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/extras/madlibz?name=The+Virtual+Meeting&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Mad Libz online game</a> that’ll bring your team at work together...by teasing each other, of course. <a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/extras/madlibz?name=The+Virtual+Meeting&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Give it a try</a>—it’s the perfect way to start any virtual meeting.</p>

<div class="c6 " style="margin-bottom:7px">
<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
FROM THE CREW
</h3>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The Washington Redskins said yesterday they’re officially <a href="https://www.washingtonpost.com/sports/2020/07/13/redskins-change-name-announcement/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">dropping their nickname</a>, which is a racist slur toward Native Americans. But now begins the next chapter—searching for a new name and logo. We asked Brew readers for their ideas last week:</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Government-related nicknames like the Generals, Diplomats, Senators, Monuments, and Lobbyists were popular picks. So was the Dysfunctionals. </span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Of the more </span><span><em>creative </em></span><span>nicknames we liked the Swamp Monsters, the Cherry Blossoms, the Warlocks, the Cosmos, and the Losers.</span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Hundreds of</span><span><em> </em></span><span><span>readers suggested the </span></span><span><a href="https://deadspin.com/tuskegee-airmen-would-be-honored-to-have-washington-t-1844365467?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Redtails</a></span><span><span>, which is a tribute to the Tuskegee Airmen—the first Black aviators in the U.S. Army Air Corps during WWII. The Redtails is the current betting favorite at </span></span><span><a href="https://www.casino.org/news/odds-released-on-washington-redskins-new-name-redtails-favored/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">3/1 odds</a></span><span><span>.</span></span><span>
</span>
</li>
</ul>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</th>
</tr>
</table>

width: 100%; max-width: 670px;\" width=\"670\" class=\"story-header-image\" src=\"https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8xNzEyL2JsYW5rX2NoZWNrX2NvbXBhbnkuanBnIiwiYnVja2V0Ijoib3Nsby1wcm9kdWN0aW9uIiwiZWRpdHMiOnsicmVzaXplIjp7IndpZHRoIjoxMDAwLCJoZWlnaHQiOm51bGx9fX0=\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;\"\u003e\n\u003csmall\u003e\u003cem\u003eFrancis Scialabba\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/small\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eTypically, the only way to get your hands on a blank check has been to direct a Marvel movie or have the last name Mahomes. Now, there might be another option. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003e2020: the year of the blank check\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eA blank check company, also known as a special purpose acquisition company (SPAC), is essentially a shell company listed on a public exchange that uses the funds it raises from selling shares to acquire a private company or startup.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eYesterday, billionaire hedge fund manager Bill Ackman’s SPAC targeting “mature unicorns” \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-07-13/ackman-s-blank-check-company-increases-ipo-target-to-4-billion?sref=KkPzpZvz\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eincreased the size\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e of its public offering set to take place later this week. \u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003ePlus...\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003eelectric vehicle maker Fisker \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2020/07/13/ev-startup-fisker-to-go-public-through-merger-with-apollo-backed-firm-at-combined-value-of-2point9-billion.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eannounced\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e it plans to go public through a merger with the blank check company Spartan Energy. \u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003ePlus, plus...\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003eU.S. healthcare provider MultiPlan is \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.ft.com/content/9a611108-caae-4a74-80b1-1235f4b8ba9b?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eset to merge\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e with a SPAC run by former Citigroup exec Michael Klein in an $11 billion deal that should be completed in October.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eThe blank check backstory\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eWhen going public via an IPO, a company has to deal with underwriters, investors, and a volatile market before it knows how much capital it will raise. In a blank check acquisition, \u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/blank-check-boom-gets-boost-from-coronavirus-11594632601?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003enegotiations are simpler\u003c/a\u003e, involving only the company and the SPAC.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eThat's why electric car maker Nikola decided on a blank check acquisition instead of an IPO, according to CFO Kim Brady. “We chose the SPAC route because there was simply too much uncertainty in the market with the coronavirus,” Brady told the WSJ. “If we had pursued the IPO path, we would not be a public company at this point.”\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eBlank check acquisitions have been recently popular in the electric vehicle industry. Fisker's CEO Henrik Fisker explained the reasons behind the move to Emerging Tech Brew's Ryan Duffy yesterday. “The car industry is so capital-intensive. I’ve done this before. I really didn’t see the possibility of raising a billion dollars in private financing that easy,” Fisker said. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eBottom line:\u003c/strong\u003e Bill Ackman is betting the market for SPACs is only getting bigger. His blank check offering is expected to be the largest ever.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS --\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" Gavin Newsom \u003ca href=\"https://www.latimes.com/california/story/2020-07-13/newsom-california-county-rollback-reopening-coronavirus?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eannounced\u003c/a\u003e major new statewide restrictions to deal with \u003ca href=\"https://www.latimes.com/projects/california-coronavirus-cases-tracking-outbreak/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003erising COVID-19 cases\u003c/a\u003e and hospitalizations, including closing bars and indoor dining as well as museums, zoos, and other family entertainment.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eIn 30 counties on the state’s watch list, gyms, churches, salons, and malls will be forced to close. Those counties account for more than 80% of California’s population.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eFor many businesses, this announcement comes about one month after they were allowed to welcome patrons back inside following the first wave of shutdowns. Restaurants can still operate takeout and outdoor dining, and bars can serve drinks outside.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eNewsom tightened restrictions ahead of July Fourth as a precaution, but that didn’t stop the LA area from having its worst week on record last week. “It’s incumbent upon all of us to recognize soberly that COVID-19 is not going away any time soon until there is a vaccine or an effective therapy,” Newsom said. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eLooking ahead...\u003c/strong\u003eyesterday, the LA and San Diego public school districts said classes will start out \u003ca href=\"https://www.npr.org/sections/coronavirus-live-updates/2020/07/13/890475212/los-angeles-and-san-diego-schools-announce-online-only-fall?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eonline-only this August\u003c/a\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS --\u003e\n\u003ctable style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eIt took Apple more than 40 years to hit a $1 trillion market cap, which it first did in August 2018. But Apple’s stock has gained nearly 30% this year on overall bullishness people will want the newest iPhone, especially in China.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eBottom line: \u003c/strong\u003eDespite a looming antitrust hearing in two weeks, Big Tech has \u003c/span\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/siriusxm-to-buy-stitcher-podcasting-unit-from-scripps-11594075192?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" produces shows under its Earwolf and Stitcher brands, and sells advertising spots across 250+ shows. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;line-height: 1.38;\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"text-decoration: none;\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eThe what: \u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan style=\"text-decoration: none;\"\u003eSirius will also get the podcast ad company Stitcher bought a few years back, Midroll Media. But it needs to figure out how Midroll will sync up with AdsWizz, the podcast ad tech company it got in 2018 when it acquired Pandora (which \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan style=\"text-decoration: none;\"\u003ealso\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan style=\"text-decoration: none;\"\u003e streams podcasts).\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;line-height: 1.38;\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"text-decoration: none;\"\u003eThe why: \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/strong\u003e\u003cspan style=\"text-decoration: none;\"\u003eSirius is trying to compete against Spotify, Apple, and iHeartMedia. Apple was first to the podcast space, but Spotify is muscling its way into becoming the Spotify of podcasts. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli dir=\"ltr\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px;list-style-type: disc; text-decoration: none;\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\r\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;line-height: 1.38;\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"text-decoration: none;\"\u003eOver the last few months, Spotify has ramped things up to 1.5x speed, recruiting big names like Joe Rogan, Kim Kardashian West, The Ringer, and DC Comics to its platform. advertising offerings. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\r\n\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp Chipotle is caving to popular demand and \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnn.com/2020/07/13/business/chipotle-cauiflower-rice/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003etesting\u003c/a\u003e cilantro-lime “cauliflower rice” at 55 locations across Denver and Wisconsin. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eCauliflower rice is pretty much what it sounds like—cauliflower pulsed into rice-sized pieces. Low in calories and carbs and high in fiber and antioxidants, cauliflower has become a popular substitute for grains, mashed potatoes, pizza crust, and gnocchi when you get bored of eating things that have taste.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eFun fact: \u003c/strong\u003eArkansas, the U.S.’ biggest rice-producer, \u003ca href=\"https://qz.com/1583670/cauliflower-rice-is-a-hot-political-issue-in-arkansas/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ebanned companies\u003c/a\u003e from marketing cauliflower rice as “rice” last year.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eWhy mess with something that’s already perfect? \u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eConsumers have been gravitating to healthier, plant-based, and low-carb options, especially since gaining the COVID-15. Chipotle’s tried getting ahead of trends; last year, it refreshed menus to be friendlier to keto, paleo, and Whole30 diets. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eBut don’t expect too many changes. CEO Brian Niccol has said Chipotle won’t offer plant-based protein like Beyond Meat because they’re too processed. (Brian, if you’re reading, let us introduce you to \u003ca href=\"https://cleangreensimple.com/recipe/jackfruit-carnitas/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ejackfruit carnitas\u003c/a\u003e.)\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eZoom out: \u003c/strong\u003eThe biggest hurdle isn’t convincing customers to try cauliflower rice...it’s the $2 surcharge.
